org.judal.metadata

Class SchemaMetaData

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.judal.metadata.SchemaMetaData

  • public class SchemaMetaData
extends java.lang.Object
    In-memory structure for holding a data model
    Author:
    Sergio Montoro Ten

      • get

        public ExtendableDef get(java.lang.String objectName)
        Get instance of ClassPackage, ViewDef, TableDef, ProcedureDef, TriggerDef or SequenceDef.
        Parameters:
        objectName - String object name
        Returns:
        ExtendableDef instance or null if this SchemaMetaData does not contain an object with the given name

      • addMetadata

        public void addMetadata(SchemaMetaData metadata)
                 throws javax.jdo.JDOUserException
        Add objects from another SchemaMetaData instance
        Parameters:
        metadata - SchemaMetaData
        Throws:
        javax.jdo.JDOUserException - If this SchemaMetaData already contains any object contained at given SchemaMetaData

      • addPackage

        public ClassPackage addPackage(java.lang.String packageName)
        Create a new ClassPackage instance and add it to this SchemaMetaData
        Parameters:
        packageName - String
        Returns:
        ClassPackage

      • addPackage

        public void addPackage(ClassPackage classPackage)
        Add an existing ClassPackage instance to this SchemaMetaData
        Parameters:
        classPackage - ClassPackage

      • getPackage

        public ClassPackage getPackage(java.lang.String packageName)
        Get ClassPackage by name. Package names are case insensitive.
        Parameters:
        packageName - String ClassPackage Name
        Returns:
        ClassPackage or null if this SchemaMetaData does not contain a package with the given name

      • containsPackage

        public boolean containsPackage(java.lang.String packageName)
        Check whether this SchemaMetaData contains a ClassPackage with the given name. Package names are case insensitive.
        Parameters:
        packageName - String ClassPackage Name
        Returns:
        boolean

      • addTable

        public void addTable(TableDef tableDef,
                     java.lang.String packageName)
        Add an existing TableDef instance to this SchemaMetaData. If this instance already contains a TableDef with the same name as the provided then the existing TableDef is replaced.
        Parameters:
        tableDef - TableDef
        packageName - String

      • removeTable

        public void removeTable(java.lang.String tableName,
                        java.lang.String packageName)
        Remove from this SchemaMetadata the reference to TableDef with the given name. If this SchemaMetadata does not contain a TableDef with the given name then no exception is thrown.
        Parameters:
        tableName - String

      • getTable

        public TableDef getTable(java.lang.String tableName)
        Parameters:
        tableName - String Table Name
        Returns:
        TableDef or null if this SchemaMetadata does not contain a TableDef with the given name.

      • containsTable

        public boolean containsTable(java.lang.String tableName)
        Check whether this SchemaMetaData contains a TableDef with the given name. Table names are case insensitive.
        Parameters:
        tableName - String TableDef Name
        Returns:
        boolean

      • addView

        public void addView(ViewDef viewDef)
        Add an existing ViewDef instance to this SchemaMetaData. If this instance already contains a ViewDef with the same name as the provided then the existing ViewDef is replaced.
        Parameters:
        viewDef - ViewDef

      • removeView

        public void removeView(java.lang.String viewName)
        Remove from this SchemaMetadata the reference to ViewDef with the given name. If this SchemaMetadata does not contain a ViewDef with the given name then no exception is thrown.
        Parameters:
        viewName - String

      • getView

        public ViewDef getView(java.lang.String viewName)
        Parameters:
        viewName - String View Name
        Returns:
        ViewDef or null if this SchemaMetadata does not contain a ViewDef with the given name.

        public boolean containsView(java.lang.String viewName)

        Parameters:
        viewName - String ViewDef Name
        Returns:
        boolean

      • addIndex

        public void addIndex(IndexDef indexDef)
              throws javax.jdo.JDOUserException,
                     javax.jdo.JDOUnsupportedOptionException
        Add an existing UniqueIndexDef or NonUniqueIndexDef instance to this SchemaMetaData. If this instance already contains a IndexDef with the same name as the provided then the existing IndexDef is replaced.
        Parameters:
        indexDef - IndexDef
        Throws:
        javax.jdo.JDOUserException - If the table referenced by the IndexDef is not contained in this SchemaMetadata.
        javax.jdo.JDOUnsupportedOptionException

      • addProcedure

        public void addProcedure(ProcedureDef procDef)
        Add an existing ProcedureDef instance to this SchemaMetaData. If this instance already contains a ProcedureDef with the same name as the provided then the existing ProcedureDef is replaced.
        Parameters:
        procDef - ProcedureDef

      • removeProcedure

        public void removeProcedure(java.lang.String procedureName)
        Remove from this SchemaMetadata the reference to ProcedureDef with the given name. If this SchemaMetadata does not contain a ProcedureDef with the given name then no exception is thrown.
        Parameters:
        procedureName - String

      • getProcedure

        public ProcedureDef getProcedure(java.lang.String procedureName)
        Parameters:
        procedureName - String Procedure Name
        Returns:
        ProcedureDef or null if this SchemaMetadata does not contain a ProcedureDef with the given name.

        public boolean containsProcedure(java.lang.String procedureName)

        Returns:
        boolean

      • addTrigger

        public void addTrigger(TriggerDef trigDef)
        Add trigger.
        Parameters:
        trigDef - TriggerDef

      • removeTrigger

        public void removeTrigger(java.lang.String triggerName)
        Remove trigger. I no trigger is found with the given name this method does nothing and does not return any error.
        Parameters:
        triggerName - String

      • getTrigger

        public TriggerDef getTrigger(java.lang.String triggerName)
        Get TriggerDef by name. Lookup is case insensitive.
        Parameters:
        triggerName - String
        Returns:
        TriggerDef or nulll if no trigger is found with given name

        Parameters:
        triggerName - String
        Returns:
        boolean

        Parameters:

      • removeSequence

        public void removeSequence(java.lang.String sequenceName)
        Remove sequence. I no sequence is found with the given name this method does nothing and does not return any error.
        Parameters:
        sequenceName - String

      • getColumns

        public ColumnDef[] getColumns(java.lang.String tableName)
                       throws java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException
        Get columns of a given table.
        Parameters:
        tableName - String
        Returns:
        ColumnDef[]
        Throws:
        java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - If no table with the given name is contained at this SchemaMetadata
